Text.Page: (This teleportal will exit the instance and take you to the <font color='#0000FF'>Professors Redoubt</font> in the Eldritch Academy.)
(Use the teleportal to leave the Hall of Vadoma.)

(The shield stone is active once more. There is nothing left for you to do here.)

(Use the teleportal to leave.)Use the teleportal.Return to the Professors Redoubt.
